title: Systematic Instructional Design for Optimizing E-Learning Time Efficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Emphasizing workplace-applicable mathematical problem-solving competencies for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete self-directed learning within 5 hours per week following the systematic instructional design materials provided in the LMS.
Learners can resolve questions by utilizing pre-built FAQ modules at least 80% effectively to manage e-learning discussions efficiently.
Learners can reduce revision time by 30% when modifying assignments through a module-based structured feedback system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
